contentrichtext.text: {{unsourced|date=October 2011}} [[File:Higashimorokata District in Miyazaki Prefecture.png|thumb|250px]] {{nihongo|'''Higashimorokata'''|東諸県郡|Higashimorokata-gun}} is a [[districts of Japan|district]] located in [[Miyazaki Prefecture|Miyazaki]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the district has an estimated [[population]] of 42,283 and the [[population density|density]] of 114.12 persons per km². The total area is 370.50 km². == Towns and villages == *[[Aya, Miyazaki|Aya]] *[[Kunitomi, Miyazaki|Kunitomi]] == Merger == *On January 1, 2006 the town of [[Takaoka, Miyazaki|Takaoka]] merged into the city of [[Miyazaki, Miyazaki|Miyazaki]]. {{Miyazaki}} {{coord|31|59|N|131|19|E|source:kolossus-frwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Districts in Miyazaki Prefecture]] {{miyazaki-geo-stub}}
